website_summaries.verdict: If romance is on the menu, this unique picnic basket makes for a memorable experience. Pricey, but the quality is exceptional.
pros: Great for anniversaries or as a wedding gift
Each component is of the highest possible quality, from the woven willow basket to the stainless-steel flatware
Includes linen napkins and picnic blanket
cons: Somewhat heavy to carry over longer distances

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS PICNIC BASKET
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect romantic picnic basket for the perfect picnic. I used it for a father's day picnic. My BF loved it! I definitely recommend this product for someone looking to have an intimate picnic for their significant other or just a cute dainty picnic with your girls. I receive so many compliments on it as we were in the park.
customer_reviews.author: April W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous basket and looks very old fashioned and romantic. The only reason I wouldn't give it 5 stars is that the handles were kind of stiff and didn't want to move freely and the chains that hold the lid weren't exactly the same length, leading to the top opening a bit crooked. The plates are good quality, and the rest of the accessories are also very nice. I found this basket in a catalog at a much higher price so found a good deal here at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: crznszn

customer_reviews.title: I love it except...
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it has everything that was listed and is big enough to hold plenty of food and drinks for two. As much as I love it there are a few problems with it. The lid doesn't stay open and it doesn't have anything I can use to keep it open, I had to use the napkins to wrap the plates in so they don't get scratched. The blanket is too small for two people to sit together comfortably and it doesn't seem like it's for out door use. I instead ended up ordering a blanket specifically for outdoor picnic use. It's also not insulated at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I love it soo much! I bought it for my bf and I to use and it’s actually bigger than I thought it would be! It’s perfect and in pristine condition. I’m so excited to use it, I hope he likes it! Even my cat Charlie was curious. It’s a great and beautiful gift.
customer_reviews.author: Yanely C

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect 2 of everything
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my niece wedding gift... It is perfect 2 of everything.. I had napkins and cloth monogrammed.. It made a very nice wedding gift.. In the reading of this it said would monogram but at check out there was no mention of personalization ... despite this am very satisfied with my purchase ...
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Great Wedding gift
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this as a wedding gift I was hoping for good things. When I received it and opened it to check it out, I was very happy. Stainless cutlery & salt & pepper shakers, cloth napkins & ample room to add the bottle of champagne before I gifted it. There is plenty of room to add the picnic items.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Best Picnic Basket Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this picnic basket! It is very sturdy and has a lot of room. It does get a bit heavy if you put a lot of items in it, but that does not bother me. This is a great quality item and I know I will be using it in the years to come!
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Keep the Romance Alive
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful testament to making romantic time together; a lovely actual valentine which could be useful whenever needed.
customer_reviews.author: jimjcarl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adorable picnic basket. Daughter was thrilled with this. So nicely made . Very big and well equipped.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. MccAin

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Cute! But mine came with a broken glass cup.. The inside top cover also was detached and the outside of the basket was chipped.
customer_reviews.author: Giselle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a special picnic for 2
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a special anniversary picnic celebration. It was received with delight! The basket is well constructed and the contents were perfect. It was an extravagant purchase at $145 and now we see it for double that price! So, 1 Star off for that!
customer_reviews.author: Lewie D

customer_reviews.title: cute but defective on lid
customer_reviews.text: super cute and big to be able to fit a lot of food, also comes with two small plates and a cutting board that i wasn’t expecting..but one of the sides is defective so the lid droops on one side when it’s opened :((
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 4.5 stars I would. It was so, so cute and everything in it was very nice and wrapped very well for travel. The couple I gave it to loved it! The only thing I did not like was the handles were a little lopsided and the lid was kinda hard to shut with wine glasses. They seemed to be in the way and it took a few tries to get the basket to shut.
customer_reviews.author: M.ann

customer_reviews.title: Came with Broken plates but still cute.
customer_reviews.text: The plates that came with my order are broken :/ cute for picnics but fragile so far I love the basket just sucks that the plates came broken and I’d have to send the whole thing back for a replacement... not cool
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Flores

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and Durable
customer_reviews.text: It’s HUGE! Extremely sturdy, and just big enough to fit enough food for two! I adore the heart shape and I’m very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cinammon

customer_reviews.title: The basket is nice but the lid doesn't stay open
customer_reviews.text: The basket is nice but the lid doesn't stay open. One of the plates is also severely scratched. Since it's a wedding gift, I can't give it to the couple considering those defects. I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... gift certificate to a local deli I got a wonderful thank you card on how much they loved my ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this Picnic Basket as a wedding gift filled it with a bottle of wine and a gift certificate to a local deli I got a wonderful thank you card on how much they loved my gift, I was very happy on how much they enjoyed my gift. Thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: best purchase i’ve made in a LONG time!! super adorable and perfect for a cute picnic date. also bigger than expected and it holds a lot of stuff! it was EXTREMELY worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: jorby moreno

customer_reviews.title: Much Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: We thought this would make a lovely wedding gift, so we ordered 2. When they came in, they were much larger than expected. Quality was very good also.
customer_reviews.author: MCPCMP

customer_reviews.title: Honeymoon gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this beautiful basket for my fiance and myself. It came in and I was amazed at heavy and sturdy it is. It would a little to heavy to lug on long walking trips to the picnic sites, but the qualityof the real china and silverware is worth it. I will purchase another one for my cousin's wedding gift.
customer_reviews.author: Tiko Landers

customer_reviews.title: First Rate!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we were lookong for. It is the perfect picnic basket.
customer_reviews.author: Tucson Ron

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ite
customer_reviews.text: This basket is truly a beautiful item. It's sturdy and spacious and all of the utensils are well made. My only issue is that the lid does not perfectly fit. It's a minor nuisance. Overall I'm happy with my purchase and looking forward to using it again really soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a prop in my engagement photos! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged and sturdy. The first gift recipient loved it
customer_reviews.text: arrived in lightening speed. ordered quantity of 5 on Friday. 2 arrived the following Monday and the other 3 arrived the next day. Well packaged and sturdy. The first gift recipient loved it. I look forward to seeing the expressions when we gift the others.
customer_reviews.author: robbin

customer_reviews.title: It's a large basket.  Sturdy in great quality
customer_reviews.text: This basket is sturdy and large enough to actually put things in. The description fits what you receive.
customer_reviews.author: Judy B. Rams fan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I had expected. Picnic basket with a romantic flair.
customer_reviews.author: W. Bystrzycki

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!!
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room and everything was of good quality. Wife loved it and in the end that's all that counts!
customer_reviews.author: john s

customer_reviews.title: Well made and super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully appointed basket Filled with goodies and was a well received gift
customer_reviews.author: Penny Lane

customer_reviews.title: The quality is not very good.
customer_reviews.text: It is too big. The quality is not very good.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: But the basket was liked it very much
customer_reviews.text: Cutlery 's cheap . But the basket was liked it very much . I went to a picnic with family .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whimsy Out of the Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect addition for my whimsy in the kitchen or when I take Café L'Amour out of the kitchen. If you know anything about Jacqui Malouf's cookbook, "Booty Food", this little basket may help you up your picnic rating. Read more:
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect for a picnic at the base of maroon bells near aspen! just what i envisioned!
customer_reviews.author: charles spong

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend this product it
customer_reviews.text: This picnic basket was more than I expected. Would definitely recommend this product it, is very well worth it! The basket is very big and you can fit a lot of food and wine. It is also very sturdy. You definitely get your money's worth!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous basket but has a little bit of a smell when you first get it!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Manuel Patino

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: This was a wedding gift and a big hit with my brother and sister-in-law.
customer_reviews.author: C-Dub

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful great quality. Was more than I thought I would ever pay but totally worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Daydreamer

customer_reviews.title: Everyone complimented our basket
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this basket for me and my fiancé, as we were having a picnic with 3 other couples in a park, celebrating Valentines day. Everyone loved and complimented the basket. It's very well made, high quality and bigger than expected. I was able to fit everything I wanted to carry inside (see picture for everything I placed inside, with the exception of the champagne bottles, for which I carried a separate basket - the one on the right). I am very happy with the purchase and it was worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Shekymorena

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picnic basket
customer_reviews.text: This is great and beautiful picnic basket that has all that you need. Good quality items and we use it all the time. The only thing that it does not have is a latch so that you can close it securely in case it falls over none of the contents will spill out. Everything else is a huge bonus and we get many compliments on it. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail Lopyrev

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wedding gift for my fiancé and it is wonderful! It is so much bigger then we thought it would be. The flatwear is nice and heavy. We can't wait to use it! If you're thinking of buying this just get it!
customer_reviews.author: Emily R

customer_reviews.title: Makes for an incredible gift!
customer_reviews.text: I decided I had to up my gift giving game and chose to give this to my wife for a holiday - she absolutely loved it! Who can argue against grabbing some bottles of wine, some cheese and crackers, and going out to enjoy the outdoors and each others' company? The quality of the set was actually impressive and will make the event feel a bit more luxurious instead of using cheap cutlery, for example.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoidable defect
customer_reviews.text: The lid on my basket did not stay open because one of the connecting chains was too short. Seems like an easy feature to check before sending out. As others have noted, the basket is quite large: 17.75" horizontally x 15.25" vertically. I could not find this detail on the Amazon product description, and because of the size it might be a bit awkward to carry for some. Otherwise the basket seems sturdily made and the contents are of good quality. I am exchanging it for a different basket though.
customer_reviews.author: lillian

customer_reviews.title: Romantic wedding gift
customer_reviews.text: So nice. I love that it is real porcelain, silverware, glass,etc. I am giving this romantic heart shaped basket for a wedding present. I will be putting two bottles of fine wine in it. I am proud and confident that this gift will be enjoyed and appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: She just loved it! Very functional and lots of pieces included
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister as a wedding gift. She just loved it! Very functional and lots of pieces included. Perfect for a lazy afternoon picnic at the park.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Cute basket
customer_reviews.text: Basket arrived today but was missing the plates. Will be dealing with this tomorrow. Disappointing at best. Basket was pretty and well made. Nice silverware and well put together contents. It's simple but very cute.
customer_reviews.author: monkey

customer_reviews.title: Lovely quarantine gift
customer_reviews.text: Money well spent for those who like to picnic in style. Such a lovely gift for everyone quarantining but wanting to make memories outside with girlfriends at a safe distance. Everything inside is so sweet and feminine. Really impressed with the quality so far.
customer_reviews.author: LACEY

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Pic Nic Basket
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful pic nic basket. Very satisfied with this purchase. I is a Wedding Shower gift for my daughter and future son-in-law. I also purchased a pic nic blanket from Amazon to go with the pic nic basket. Nancy M.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for niece who was getting married. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Vindigni

customer_reviews.title: Romantically perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute-maybe the word is more like a “charming” romantic gift...I bought one for me and loved it so much bought one for a wedding gift for a family member!
customer_reviews.author: zena rone

customer_reviews.title: Love.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot wait to picnic with this beauty. Super happy. Its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sashanna Wynter

customer_reviews.title: Everything was included!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter’s first anniversary and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: mariannaray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a special couple!
customer_reviews.text: This basket was an Easter gift for my son & his fiancé! I added a few picnic touches-kites, bubbles, wine, & candy!! It was absolutely perfect! A romantic gift for a traditional candy holiday!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Basket
customer_reviews.text: Great basket. I bought as a present and my sister loved it. Much bigger than expected, but very sturdy and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Lovely gift for my sister, the bride
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister's bridal shower. She LOVED it. I filled it with our family's favorite recipes. I would recommend this. Very good quality, very spacious.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Dobrowolski

customer_reviews.title: Adorable basket!
customer_reviews.text: This basket is amazing! It has everything you need for a proper picnic! It is very pretty too! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ginas8

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's absolutely perfect for my engagement photo shoot. Can't wait to use it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Yourvajesty

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picnic basket my bf and I have used it and have gotten compliments!
customer_reviews.author: May Carreon

customer_reviews.title: Wedding Shower Gift
customer_reviews.text: It is a gift and we are waiting to see how the couple will like it.
customer_reviews.author: F. G. LeSavage

customer_reviews.title: perfect wedding gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for a bridal shower. It was a huge hit. It is study and of very good quality. The only thing I wish it had was some type of picnic blanket to sit on but most people I'm sure have an extra blanket in the closet they could use. I would buy this product again. It was very pretty and is a piece you could use for display in your home when not using it.
customer_reviews.author: mardelle813

product_meta.title: Picnic Time 'Heart' Willow Picnic Basket with Deluxe Service for Two
product_meta.description: Lovebirds swoon over the heart-shaped, woven-wicker Heart Picnic Basket by Picnic Time, a picnic set designed for deluxe picnic, wine, and cheese service for two. The plush fully-lined interior, napkins, and tablecloth come in lovely antique white with eyelet trim. The porcelain plates, hand-blown wine glasses, flatware, hardwood cutting board, stainless steel waiter's style corkscrew, and salt and pepper shakers are secured by dark brown leatherette straps. This complete picnic basket is perfect for Valentine's Day, anniversary gifts, as a birthday or wedding present, or for any intimate rendezvous under the sun or stars. Still no sparks? Yikes! You might actually have no game-but at least you have the Heart Picnic Basket working furiously on your behalf. Keep tryin', tiger! Measures 17-1/2 by 15 by 10 inches. We believe that our products should be strong, reliable, and work the way they were intended. That's why we are proud to offer the BUILT TO LAST Lifetime replacement pledge. If for any reason our product fails to perform as promised, Picnic Time Family of Brands will repair or replace your item without hassle- FOR LIFE.
feature_bullets: Picnic Time Heart wicker picnic basket with deluxe picnic service for two; Complete picnic basket perfect for a romantic outing
Features sturdy woven willow construction with fully lined interior and matching linens; Makes a fabulous wedding present or anniversary gift
Includes high quality porcelain plates, wine glasses and stainless steel flatware, plus wine and cheese accessories
Reinforced, folding woven handles and interior leatherette straps that secure the accessories in place; Measures 17-1/2 by 15 by 10 inches
Backed by the Picnic Time Family of Brands BUILT TO LAST Lifetime Pledge to repair or replace if defective for any reason
